import sys
#sys.stdin=open("data.txt")
input=sys.stdin.readline

for _ in range(int(input())):
	n,m,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
	n,m=sorted([n,m])
	if n%2==1 and m%2==1:
		print(-1)
		continue
	if n%2==0 and m%2==0:
		print(k)
		continue
	if n%2==1 and m%2==1:
		print(k-2)
		continue
	if n%2==0 and m%2==0:
		print(k-1)
		continue
	if n%2==1 and m%2==0:
		print(k-1)
		continue
	if n%2==0 and m%2==1:
		print(k-2)
		continue

print(sum(n%2==m%2 for n in range(k+1)))
